inn1.comm: targets a good length outside off, a hint of inward movement after pitching, he gets a stride out and defends it back down the pitch
short of a good length, shuffles across slightly and works it towards midwicket
slightly short on middle, gets back and whips it towards fine leg for a single to get things started for the hosts
full outside off, in the channel, no movement or swing on that one, Guptill lets it through
short of a good length outside off, in the corridor again, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and punches it back towards the bowler
edged and just past second slip, short of a good length, quick and nipped away and Nicol went at that one away from his body, he got a thick edge and managed to evade slip by just a bit, streaky
moed away again and produced a thick edge but well wide of the slips this time, more towards gully, rolls down to third man for one more
shortish on leg stump and moving a hint towards off, gets across a hint but doesn't get any bat on that one, struck on the thighs
short of a good length outside off, moving away and he lets it be
full ball down the leg side, tried to glance it down fine, missed, called a wide
short of a good length on middle, bowled at 139kmph, gets on the back foot and jabs it back towards the bowler
shortish on middle, gets back and turns it off his hips through square leg for one more
some width provided this time and he cashes in, slashing it hard past a diving point to the boundary
held it back again but aimed more at middle, gets on the back foot and dabs it into the leg side
fuller, bowled at 131kmph, gets forward and shoulders arms to that ball, tempting length but he restrains himself
bowled on a good length on the off, holds its line, rocks forward and guides it towards point
punished, short, a half-tracker outside off and Guptill is in position early, rocking back to pull it hard over midwicket
dropped it short outside off but much closer to the stumps this time, he lets it through
a wild swing, quick from Steyn, bowled at 145kmph, Nicol charged forward and tried to dispatch it into the stands behind deep midwicket, misses as it moves away slightly
short of a good length on the off, plays it from the crease towards point
ooh, beaten by that one, landed just short of a good length outside off and darted away a hint, rocked back and tried to defend it inside the line and missed
a blow to the back, banged in short by Steyn and Nicol tries to evade it, must have hurt though he doesn't show it
wide, a touch too short, a touch too wide and it even goes past an attempted upper-cut by Nicol
around the off stump, holding it back slightly, defended towards extra cover
dropped it on a good length outside off this time and got it to deviate away from the batsman after pitching, Nicol fails to make contact
bowled it short outside off, holds its line and he leaves it alone
shortish on the off, moving back just a little, punched towards extra cover
gets a thick inside edge onto his boot as he rocks back to punch one through cover
sliding on the pads, turned away through square leg for a couple of runs, takes a while for fine leg to get around and gather that
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards cover
bowled it full on middle, pushes it back to the bowler from the crease
bowled at 146kmph on a good length on the off, decides to play it off the back foot and defends it towards cover
Nicol opens up, that was coming, pitched on a length and Nicol charged down the wicket and slapped it ruthlessly, left right and centre, drilling it past mid-on
back of a length on the off, pushed gently towards cover off the front foot
bouncer from Steyn, bowled at 144kmph and Nicol sways out of the way very quickly
bowled much slower, on middle and leg, shuffles across a hint and tickles it down towards fine leg for a single
short and wide and he tries to cut him over point, playing much away from his body there and missed it as the ball moved away, Steyn gives him a long stare

Given out lbw, the umpire wants to check if it's a no-ball and it's not, the foot has landed behind the line, there's some swing for Tsotsobe, inswing, Nicol moves across to flick that square, it landed on off and middle and was heading into the stumps as Nicol missed and was rapped on the pads. He looked rusty out there, and now has to head back
rocks back and defends it into the off side, thinks of a single but is sent back
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and taps it towards cover
steps forward to that fuller delivery and opens the face slightly go guide it towards third man

short of a good length on the off, nipped back in and Guptill was late on that one as he got back to defend, got a thin inside edge that just evaded leg stump, they manage to get three past fine leg, lucky

McCullum's on his way, similar delivery to the one that got rid of Nicol, except that McCullum has it well covered and was aiming at midwicket, not square leg, picked it easily, clipping it over midwicket for a boundary
angles that in towards middle and leg, turns it wide of midwicket for a single
good length outside off, rocks forward and shoulders arms to that one
bowled it full on middle and McCullum drove it soundly to mid-on
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and opens the face on that one, placing it behind point for a single
short and wide and Guptill seizes the chance, rocking back and carting it over point, powerfully struck
back of a length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it towards cover

Edged and just short of third man, full outside off and McCullum was looking to smash it over mid-off, it went the other way however, third man ran in, it fell short of him and he failed to get his body behind that one
short of a good length outside off, leaves it alone this time
tempting him with another fuller delivery outside off but it's a touch too wide, left alone and called a wide
short of a good length outside off, bowled at 123kmph, leaves it be
beaten, pushed it full, much closer to the stumps this time, moved away after pitching and McCullum was driving inside the line to that one
pitched up and it's dealt with this time, gets to the pitch and hammers it through mid-off and  extra cover
back of a length on the off, steps back and pushes it down the pitch
short outside off, moving away after pitching, shoulders arms to that one
in the channel outside off stump, bowled at 146kmph, holds its line and it's left alone
banged in short outside off, bowled at 147kmph, evaded it easily
short on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it to point, Guptill wants a single but is sent back
short outside off, tries to upper-cut that, the shot was on, the bounce was just right but Guptill failed to connect
short again and he gets forward this time to smack it on the up through extra cover but again, fails to make contact
short of a good length outside off, angling away from th right-hander, McCullum lets it be
pushed it full outside off, stretched forward and pushed it gently to extra cover
bowled at 121kmph, landed on a good length and held its line, McCullum left it alone
there is a man at deep point for McCullum but he had no chance there, short and wide and McCullum thrashed it in front of square on the off side, beating Amla in the deep to the ropes

dropped, Tsotsobe has put it down, ooh, pitched up and McCullum was aiming at extra cover but the bat turned in his hand and he ended up playing it back to the bowler, Tsotsobe was late to react, got both his hands around it but couldn't hold on
bowled full and McCullum just lets it be, he is fortunate to still be there
Morkel bowls it short outside off, that's chopped past a diving point, third man gets across and palms it to deep point, two more
a touch fuller, bowled just a fraction short of a good length, defended off the back foot towards cover
an attempted upper-cut again, one of at least three times the shot has been tried today, missed, didn't bounce as much as he would have liked to execute that shot
short and wide and that's blazed through point but there is cover in the deep, just the single
angling in towards middle, gets back and defends it to the bowler

McCullum's been edgy, literally, he gets away with another stroke of luck, banged in short and it nipped back in, taking him by surprise, it caught him on the edge of the bat as he tried to evade it and flew past third man for a boundary
starts off with a juicy half-volley on middle and leg that is dispatched through midwicket, lovely timing on that one
bowled at 135kmph on a good length on the off, defended towards cover
short of a good length, punched a little uppishly towards extra cover, gets to him on the bounce
targeting a good length, bowled at 137kmph, defended towards point
mid-off has been pushed back, driven down the ground for a single
back of a length on the off, rocks back and punches that to cover
tossed up on middle, worked away through midwicket for a single
flighted on middle, pushed down towards long-off for one more
flatter on the off stump, pushed firmly but straight to extra cover
and again, a bit more flight on this one, extra cover in action again
round the wicket and on middle, keeps a little low, holds its line, tapped into the leg side
flighted, bowled it full on middle, driven down to deep midwicket for a single
short of a good length on the off, punched past cover into the deep for a single
bowled it full on the off, driven straight to extra cover
excellent timing from Guptill, short of a good length, he got back, stood up tall and just punched it past the bowler to beat mid-on and Amla chasing from mid-off
a bit of extra bounce there from a good length, bowled at 135kmph, defended into the off side
short of deep square leg, Guptill rued playing that shot the moment he hit it, he knew he hadn't timed it well, short but mistimed and it landed on the bounce to Kallis
pushed back watchfully towards the bowler
angling in towards off, pushed down towards long-off for a single
defended into the off side
knocks it over towards midwicket
driven off the back foot in the direction of mid-on
gets forward and plays it towards square leg, another dot
bowled it short on middle, gets on the back foot and whips it through midwicket for a single, a tidy over
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, tapped towards extra cover off the front foot
short and it's cut hard into the ground, Faff du Plessis throws himself to his left at point and prevents a few runs
slower offcutter, McCullum gets forward and defends it watchfully into the off side
Steyn errs in length and pays the price, the pressure was buidling on McCullum, it was bowled short on middle and leg and he helped it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
that's disappeared, short and wide and he loves width, is onto it quickly, slashing it past a diving point, there is a deep cover in place but he's of no use against that shot
the slower one from Steyn, McCullum knocks it into the leg side and Steyn charges towards it and has a glare at McCullum
bowled at 143kmph, short of a good length on the off, gets an inside edge as he tries to close the face on that one
in the channel outside off, McCullum stretches forward and pats it to cover
well struck but straight to mid-off, pitched up from Morkel and it's struck sweetly but not placed well enough
back of a length on the off, bowled at 144kmph, is nicely behind that one, knocking it down in front of the bowler
short on middle, swivels and pulls it stylishly wide of Tsotsobe at fine leg for a couple of runs
floating it on middle, drives it towards long-off for a single
flighted on middle, plays it back firmly down the pitch to the bowler
powerfully hit, short, a hint of away turn, and he is in an excellent position to thump that past extra cover off the back foot
angling in towards middle and leg, closes the face a little early on that one and gets a leading edge, lands on the bounce towards the bowler
sliding down the leg side, called a wide
bowled it straight, slightly short, McCullum made room, targeting the extra-cover region again, but got a thick inside edge onto the pads
short of a good length on the off, punched off the back foot to cover, thinks of a single but it's not available
deep point has no chance, short from Steyn and Guptill latches onto it, gets back and cracks it hard in front of square
there to hit and Guptill will feel disappointed he missed out there, tried to slash that over point but didn't make contact
goes across the line this time, short again, he attempted a cut the previous delivery, now he tries to dispatch it over midwicket, a touch too quick and he misses again
short and it's cut hard this time but Kallis has it covered at deep point, just a single

missed run-out, tapped towards point and Guptill calls for the single, du Plessis collects, moving to his right, and aims at the stumps at the striker's end but misses, a direct hit would have had Guptill
flighted on the off stump, played it down to long-off for a single
Guptill had eyed the gap and got the placement to perfection, tossed up, landed full outside off and he smacked it over extra cover, with the turn, for a one bounce four
gets forward and defends it towards the bowler
pushed it down to long-off for one more
flatter from Peterson, on middle, McCullum gets forward and defends solidly
meaty strike, long hop and McCullum seizes the length early, gets on the back foot and pulls it hard and far into the stands behind deep midwicket
gets a thick outside edge to third man as he tries to force that off the back foot
tries to smash that over extra cover but doesn't get hold, landed full outside off
the pair almost collided while stealing that run, pushed gently past the bowler for a quick single
short of a good length on middle, bowled at 122kmph, turned towards midwicket
shortish outside off, stands tall and knocks it down towards point
whipped off the back foot to deep square leg for a single, brings up a well-contructed half-century, his 16th in ODIs
the boundaries keep flowing, plenty of flight outside off and it lands on a length, Guptill reaches forward and caresses that through extra cover, the field is spread but that was placed superbly
short outside off, turning away, cuts it hard point into the deep for a couple more
knocked into the off side
driven towards long-on for a single
full outside leg stump and McCullum sweeps it towards fine leg to bring up his half-century, was edgy to begin with but has settled in well
gets a stride out and plays it back down the pitch
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and defends it into the off side
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and plays it back
shortish on leg stump, pitched outside, tried to whip it through square leg, it ends up going behind point
slightly short on middle and leg, turned through square leg for a single, it raises the 100-partnership between these two, they've laid a good, solid foundation
short outside off and Guptill has a swing at that one, trying to clear square leg, but doesn't connect
short of a good length, nicely guided behind point, wide of third man, for a couple of runs
charges down the track, it's held back by Kallis, McCullum slaps it but straight to mid-off
bowled on a good length, drops it in front of cover but there's no single on offer there
that's punished, too short from Kallis and McCullum likes playing the pull, thwacks it over midwicket, came off the middle
shortish on middle, a slight leading egde as he tries to play it to midwicket, goes towards long-on instead
edged and taken! Kallis strikes in his first over, short of a good length, a seemingly harmless delivery, Guptill tried to chop it past point but ended up getting a thick edge and AB took it easily
short of a good length outside off, leaves it alone to the keeper
McCullum gets a thick edge to third man as he fishes for that one outside off, just the single
angling in towards middle, defended carefully towards point
banged it short, an attempted bouncer on middle, Williamson gets out of the way in time
nicely timed, angled in towards middle, just a gentle flick past midwicket fetches him three runs, Williamson's away
short of a good length, some movement away from the batsman after pitching, left alone by McCullum
Williamson hasn't taken too long to get going, short from Kallis and that was pulled uppishly through midwicket for a couple
back of a length outside off, punched through to deep cover for a single
back of a length outside off, cracked off the back foot to deep cover
angling in towards middle, bowled at 135kmph, shortish, pushed back to the bowler

dropped, extremely difficult chance for Duminy standing at the lone wide slip, Williamson tried to push that hard off the back foot, got a thick edge and Duminy threw himself to his right but his outsretched hand couldn't hold on
gets back and cuts it towards deep point for a single
getting it on a good length outside off and also gaining some away movement, bowled at 140kmph, left alone
short of a good length at 144kmph outside off, McCullum allows that through as well
on middle and leg, worked away off the pads towards deep square leg for a single
a bit of width from Morne and it's guided down towards third man for a single
shortish on the off, rocks onto the back foot and punches it back towards the bowler
McCullum had made his mind up there, was a short ball and he tried to swat that over mid-on but mistimed it completely
short of a good length, cut past point and wide of third man in the deep for a couple of runs
cracked off the back foot towards Amla at deep point for a single
bowled at 131kmph, shortish outside off, presses it away towards extra cover
short of a good length on middle, McCullum watches it onto his bat and offers a full face
Kallis held that one back as he saw McCullum charge down, McCullum decided to let it be in the end, unable to adapt to the length
pushed off the back foot to mid-on to steal a quick single and keep strike
short of a good length on the off, pushed hard off the back foot but straight to extra cover

down the leg side, erred in line did Steyn there, McCullum tried to clip it fine, it brushed his pads and went past the diving AB, useful runs for New Zealand, they had slowed down a fair bit after Guptill's fall
on target is Steyn this time, goodish length, gets behind that one nicely and drops it into the off side
banged it short on middle and off, mistimes a pull to deep square leg for a single
goodish length outside off, guided towards third man for a single
shortish on the off, forced off the back foot towards deep cover to retain strike
shortish on middle and off, pushed towards cover off the back foot
banged in short on middle, McCullum charged out and wanted to deposit it back to Wellington but these shots just haven't come off today
just as I said that.....McCullum sends this over deep square leg! Short on the off and he has enough on that, as he goes for the pull, to send it for six, it's a short boundary there

McCullum charges out again and tries to send that over mid-on, misses it completely as it goes through the gate, Kallis lets out a stifled appeal for a caught behind but AB tells him, "there's no bat"
pushed off the back foot towards cover, thinks of a single but it's not there
an offcutter, shortish on the off, turns the face on that one and plays it to midwicket
bowls it full on the off stump, Williamson drives it towards mid-off, no single on offer there
good length outside off, steers it towards third man for a single
pitched up and McCullum runs through after pushing that to mid-off, a quick single taken
a touch too quick for Williamson who set himself up for a pull, was a touch too late in trying to execute it
opens the face and forces that towards point off the back foot but fails to get it past that fielder
slower one bowled full outside off, eased towards extra cover, a quiet over from Steyn
short of a good length on middle, turned in the direction of square leg for a single
bowled on a good length outside off, opens the face to play it to point

excellent catch by Kallis, he was standing at mid-on, Williamson charged out and tried to clear him, got plenty of elevation but it wasn't hit well, Kallis ran backwards but his focus didn't waver, he judged it to perfection, taking it behind his head and then landing on his back, Tsotsobe takes his second wicket
McCullum surprised by some extra bounce there, took off from a good length and rapped him on the glove, it pops up but lands well short of anyone
short of a good length, knocks it down in front of cover and takes off for a single
leading edge, that was a full ball down the leg side, tried to clip it fine, missed out though, it landed in front of the bowler
short of a good length, crunched towards point, no run on offer there
a thick inside edge, bowled it fuller outside off and McCullum tried to cut that, the shot didn't seem to be on, it went past short fine for a couple
streaky but he'll take it, short and wide and he was aiming to cut that past point, got a thick outside edge off the bottom of the bat to the third-man boundary
picked the length very early and dispatched it over midwicket, wasn't too short but McCullum was quick to take advantage, pulled it off the front foot
angling in towards middle and leg, a touch fuller, plays it down towards midwicket
keeps the strike with a tap towards point, Ryder responds

Tsotso takes three! McCullum timed that too well, pitched it up on the off stump and he picked it up beautifully, a lovely flick of the wrists but unfortunately for him, there was a perfectly-positioned deep square leg in place, he found that man and Ontong made no mistake
shortish on the off, gets front and across and defends it into the off side
bowled it full on leg stump, defended towards cover
bowls it full on middle, gets across and drives it towards mid-on
short of a good length on the off, chopped down in front of point
Franklin's away, that was angled in towards middle, and bowled full, Franklin got across and drove it through midwicket, pierced the gap and earned a boundary

New Zealand are sliding here, three wickets in this Powerplay, short of a good length outside off, moved away a hint, Ryder was pushing away from his body, got a thick edge through to AB, South Africa in control now
played down towards third man for a single
struck high on the pads, landed on middle and off, Franklin moved slightly across to that
banged in short on middle, a bouncer, Franklin ducks under that one
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it to cover
floating it outside off, gets forward and defends it in front of point
tossed up on middle, driven down towards long-on for a single
angling towards leg stump from round the wicket, pushed towards midwicket
bowled it flat on leg stump, Franklin got a stride out and played it into the leg side
slightly flat again, gets forward and pushes it down the pitch
tossed up on leg stump, drives it down to long-on for a single
targets a good length on middle and off, Franklin moves across and knocks it into the leg side
a fraction outside off, opens the face and plays that down towards third man
drops it short on middle, turns it through square leg for a single

New Zealand are in further trouble, Morkel strikes! Dropped it short outside off and Franklin's aim there was to just play it in front of point but ended up getting an inside edge that clipped the bails, another one down

Mills has no answer to that bouncer from Morne, banged in short on the off, a snorter of a delivery to receive first up and he could only try to fend it off, it popped up towards point and Peterson dived forward to take a comfortable catch
prevents it, short outside off and he sways out of the way quickly
on middle from round the wicket, Ellis plays it back to the bowler
short on the off, punched in the direction of midwicket
flighted on middle, driven towards deep midwicket for a single
tossed up, driven straight to midwicket from the crease
flatter, held back the line a hint, pushed straight to short mid-on
flighted outside off, cracked along the ground to deep cover for a single
short of a good length, punched through the covers for a couple of handy runs
short outside off, tried to repeat the same shot but could not connect this time
missed run-out, chopped down towards point, Faf du Plessis is there to prevent a suicidal run but can't aim accurately, Ellis was gone had that hit
in the channel outside off, bowled on a good length, left alone to the keeper
on a good length again, bowled at 136kmph, steps forward and defends towards cover
slower through the air, guided towards short third man for a quick single
short outside off, punched towards deep cover for one more
flighted on middle, driven down towards long-on for a single
on a good length on the off stump, tapped towards cover
a bit more flight on that one, outside off, chopped to point
shortish on middle, drops it in front of cover on the off side
short of a good length outside off, moving away, pokes at that one and misses
pushed that off the back foot, quite firmly, but straight to mid-on
short of a good length outside off, tapped it towards point
a short delivery on middle, Southee initially thought of moving away from it but decided to play it in the end, did a good job keeping it down
bangs it short on the leg stump this time, Southee fends it towards AB behind the stumps
back of a length on the off, defended off the back foot towards cover
pinches a single to give Southee the strike
Southee has hit them a long way before and he middles this one, tossed up on middle and he smashes it over the bowler's head for a one bounce four
played back to the bowler
around leg stump, tickles the pads on the way to short fine
fires it down the leg side, called a wide
dabbed away into the off side
floating it on middle and off, defended from the crease
too quick for the batsman, he was late in bringing the bat down to that one, got an inside edge towards fine leg for a couple to bring up the 200
short of a good length on the off, defended in front of point
on target is Steyn, firing it on middle and off, Ellis plays it back to him
short ball on the off, Ellis goes for the pull, doesn't quite time it well, Amla does well at square leg, diving to his right to field it
angling in towards middle, worked wide of mid-on for an easy single
made room did Southee and cracked it to deep cover for a single
edged and four, Southee made some room again, Albie dug it short and Southee, trying to force it off the back foot, got a thick outside edge, well past AB
Southee's middled that, short and he sensed a chance, moved back and pulled it handsomely over deep midwicket, had enough on it to clear the ropes
that's even bigger and superbly timed, straying on the pads was Albie and Southee clipped it beauitfully over the deep square leg boundary
low full toss, Southee will be disappointed he just got one for that, played it straight to deep midwicket
back of a length on the off, rocks back and taps it into the off side
Ellis turns that around towards deep square leg to keep strike, 18 off that over
plays it down to third man for a single
Southee goes after a decent cameo, short ball and he made room to swat that over mid-on but it was mistimed, found Steyn who took it easily
Nethula goes back! A first-ball duck for the man, short of a good length outside off and he can't resist fishing for it, gets a thin edge to AB, Morne's on a hat-trick again
ooh, what was McKay doing? Was fullish outside off and he made room and chased it, missed and the hat-trick was averted
dropped it short outside off, got out of the way quickly
bowled it full on the off, defended towards extra cover
short of a good length, Ellis mistimes a pull towards midwicket
excellent strike by Ellis, landed on a length and he got under it superbly, launching Kallis for a maximum over the long-on boundary
pitched on a length outside off again, swings across the line, mistimes it to midwicket
slower one that he failed to pick, tried to flick it over square leg but was into the shot too early, a leg bye behind point
back of a length on the off, gets back and defends it solidly to cover
short of a good length, stays back and offers Kallis the straight bat
Ellis refuses the single, he swings that towards deep midwicket
full toss from Morne, Ellis bunts that past the bowler and can sneak in a second run as McKay responds well

Morne collects a five-for! That went miles in the air, was the slower one and Ellis took it from a length, seeking to repeat the shot he played off Kallis, but didn't pick the slower one and found Steyn at long-on.

inn2.comm: bowled on a good length on the off, Amla gets forward and drives that towards extra cover
a bit of away swing for Mills, Amla mistimes a drive off a fullish delivery towards mid-off
short of a good length outside off, Amla chops that down towards point
short of a good length outside off, Amla lets that one go
short of a good length outside off, moving away after pitching, Amla lets that be
identical length, short of a good length again, gets it to dart away from the right-hander, Amla lets it be, a maiden to start with
short of a good length outside off, Kallis' turn to let that go, some movement for Southee too
bowled it on a good length on the off, defends it solidly towards cover off the front foot
shortish on leg stump, Kallis tries to whip that square, it clips the pads and fetches the team a leg-bye
some swing for Southee, landed full outside off and Amla was tempted into playing the drive, got a thick inside edge towards square leg
bowled from wide of the crease, short of a good length on middle, defended soundly by Amla into the leg side
back of a length outside off, Amla guides that down towards third man to get off the mark
in the channel outside off, Amla steps forward and knocks thast towards point
a bit of width and Amla went for it, short of a good length and he hammered it uppishly past a diving point
angling in towards middle and off, gets across and works it past midwicket for a single
Kallis is away, pitched up and he gets just a hint across and drives that imperiously down the ground past the bowler

short of a good length outside off, appeared to keep just a little low, Kallis pushed at it away from his body, there was a noise, an inside edge and McCullum took it inches from the ground, Aleem Dar at the bowler's end couldn't get a clear view and called for the third umpire's assistance, replays show the catch was clean and that Kallis has to go
in the channel outside off, du Plessis gets forward and allows it through
Amla is unfazed by his partner's departure, landed on a good length and he absolutely creamed it through extra cover
a tighter line, much closer to the stumps and in the corridor, Amla shoulders arms
pitched up by Southee this time and Amla drives through the line to mid-off
banged in short outside off and Amla sways out of the way in time
lovely timing, short of a good length on leg stump and he whips that past midwicket, two fielders give chase but they stand no chance, it's raced away
Amla's looking threatening, a bit of width from Southee and he drives that beautifully on the up through point and cover for four more
back of a length outside off, du Plessis walked across and tapped it to point
du Plessis warms up with an elegant boundary through extra cover, plenty of width from Mills and du Plessis leans forward and just eases it through the in-field
in the channel outside off, lands on a good length and moves away, left alone
took it from a length by stepping forward and forced it just wide of extra cover, they clinch a single as the fielder fumbles
unstoppable, just a punch, pitched up on middle and he just pushes it firmly down the pitch and it went dead straight, no one moved
All proper cricketing shots, Amla's threading the field with ease, short of a length and it's cut away behind point to beat third man, six fours in his 24, all of them top notch
du Plessis isn't going to fall behind, he's up in motion very quickly, pitched up on the pads and he just drives it past midwicket for three runs
short of a good length outside off, this one holds its line, leaves it alone
angling in towards middle, Amla walks across and drives that to mid-on
a quick bouncer outside off and Amla shaped up for the pull but was late on it, bowled at 133 kph
short of a good length on middle, shuffles and works it away between midwicket and square leg for two more
back of a length on middle, Amla is nicely behind it and defends it down the pitch
short of a good length outside off, a bit wide but du Plessis can't quite time it well as he tries to have a crack at it
angling it away from the right-hander, bowled at 138kmph, leaves it alone
taking it away from the right-hander, du Plessis tries to cover the line of the ball and pushes that to mid-off
short of a good length, guided behind point towards third man for a single
Amla's not going to spare those, a freebie, short and way too wide, Amla was determined to give it the treatment and murdered it through the covers
bowls it on a good length on middle this time, punches it to mid-on
soundly driven, pitched up and it's caressed towards mid-off and there's a fumble as he moves to his right, allowing them a single
good length on middle and off, gets forward and defends it into the off side
back of a length on the off, Amla gets behind it and strokes it to extra cover

dropped it short on the off and Amla did well to drag it stylishly through square leg, McKay ran across from fine leg and did a splendid job to dive full length and haul it back in to save a run, 50 up for South Africa
angling in towards middle, gets front and across and flicks it to mid-on
du Plessis places that perfectly, a fraction short and he made a bit of room to pierce that gap between point and cover, he's settled in well here
pitched it up on middle and leg., driven through the line to mid-on
back of a length on the off, jabs it towards midwicket
Amla is in an attacking mood, bowled it short and he was into the pull a touch too early, trying to smack it past midwicket, took the bottom of the bat
much fuller from McKay, almost yorker length but not quite, Amla digs it back to the bowler
short of a good length, bowled at 143kmph, crunched it hard into the ground and straight to extra cover
slower one bowled short outside off, pushed gently to cover, a maiden over from McKay, good stuff
length ball angling in towards off, driven crisply towards mid-off
a touch shorter, nice line once more, solidly defended back towards the bowler

du Plessis charges down and launches that over mid-off for four, not much wrong with the delivery, short of a length and not too wide of off, not much pace or movement from Ellis though, du Plessis dismisses it
blocked off the back foot towards point
du Plessis gets back, plays with soft hands, opens the face to steer the ball towards backward point for a single
Amla loves the steer to third man, normally it gets him a single, this time it fetches his a boundary, causally done by Amla, guides it fine to pick up a boundary
the run continue to flow for South Africa, overpitched and outside off, crashed past cover by du Plessis for a boundary
on the pads this time, clipped towards midwicket for a single
back of a length and on the leg stump, whipped away towards deep square leg off the back foot
full and wide, McKay is being taken apart here, du Plessis hammers this past point for four, not the best line and length from McKay this over
four more! half-volley from McKay, clipped past a diving mid-on by du Plessis, South Africa race on to 77

everything going South Africa's way, a top edge a du Plessis looks to pull, the ball is in the air a long while, but not long enough for a fielder on the rope to settle under it, it lands well short of deep square leg
once more the steer down to third man, just a single this time
a sharp bouncer from Ellis, du Plessis is startled by that one, off the handle of the bat and onto the helmet grille

wow, absolutely spectacular bit of cricket here, another bouncer from Ellis, a disdainful pull from du Plessis, seemed headed for six, except Guptill was in the way at deep square leg, he was less than a yard in from the rope, took the catch, realised he was going over, so he nonchalantly lobbed the ball up, went over the rope, balanced himself, got back and collected the ball again, du Plessis is gone, I think the highlight of that was how cool Guptill was, no panic whatsoever, and made it look like he was completing a routine bit of fielding
defended towards backward point by Amla
looks for the drive through off, inside-edged towards midwicket
attempting a yorker but it turns out to be a full toss, Duminy plays it behind square and has time to come back for the second

Duminy's been given out lbw but he's called for a review, looked plumb and would have hit middle and leg as he moved across to that delivery angling in, but Hot Spot showed a heat signature as the ball was going past the bat, he's got an inside edge, the decision has been overturned
short of a good length on theoff, rocks back and defends it into the off side
gets across and works it off his hips through square leg for a single
short on middle, Amla is pushed back and he defends that into the leg side
Ellis strays on the pads, Duminy gets off strike by working it past midwicket for a single
good length on the off, Amla gets front and across and defends that solidly to cover
ooh, that was uppish, opened the face on that one and almost sliced it towards third man for a single
dropped it short and Duminy bisected the gap between fine leg and deep square leg with precision, kept it along the ground as he played that pull
short of a good length at 130kmph on the off stump, defended towards cover
looking confident is Duminy, gets forward and drives that on the up towards mid-off
pitched up on the off stump, square-drives it past point into the deep for a single
bowled it full on the off, drives it through the line to mid-off
back of a length on the off, Duminy moves behind it and plays it to point
nips back in a hint, Duminy gets a thick inside edge behind square leg for a single
bowled it on a length on the off stump, crunched towards mid-off
shortish outside off, runs it down comfortably to third man, has plenty of time to play his shots does Amla, just a single this time
starts off with a short and wide delivery outside off and Amla cashes in, slashing it mercilessly through point
much better, flighted on the off, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
Was that a googly? Appeared to turn the other way, punched past cover for a single
flighted on middle, pushes it down the ground to long-on this time, raises his half-century, as fluent as they come
spun in sharply, too close to cut for Duminy, landed a fraction outside off and came back in, he just about managed to chop it to point
floating it on the off stump, pushed towards mid-off and Amla calls for a quick single
on the pads, tries to flick it, it brushes his pads and they sneak a leg-bye
defended solidly off the front foot
pushed off the front foot towards mid-on
banged in short and Amla fetches it from outside off to drag it past midwicket, it has enough legs on it to roll over the ropes, runs continue to flow
punched from the crease towards point
worked away off the back foot past midwicket for a single
tossed up on middle and this deceived Amla because it went on straight and he tried to close the face on it, getting the leading edge
pushed towards point off the back foot
short outside off, cut past a diving point for a single
Duminy was looking to sweep that fine but ended up lobbing it up towards square leg, it landed safely however
short of a good length, Amla moves back and slaps it to deep cover
that went on straight as well, slightly short outside off, chopped to point
Southee sends in a low full toss from slightly wide of the crease, Amla went across to flick it through square leg for a single, there was a bit of reverse-swing on that one
short ball outside off, Duminy pulls it in front of square, through the midwicket region, for three more runs
angling in towards middle, Amla gets across slightly and drives that to mid-on
back of a length, punched towards deep cover for a single
four more, another short ball doled out by Southee and Duminy pulls off an almost identical shot as earlier in the over, except this is timed better and it finds the boundary
targeting the stumps this time, Duminmy moves back in his crease and defends it to point
shortish outside off, Amla moves back and chops it to point
Amla miscued that one, got a top-edge, flighted on middle and he went for the slog-sweep against the turn but it ended up landing safe, behind mid-on
quicker through the air, Amla shapes for the cut and misses, Nethula's mixing it

dropped, Nicol drops a sitter, tossed up outside off and Amla was looking to go over long-off this time, miscued it again and Nicol got into position but failed to hold on in front of his chest, Nethula smiles helplessly
more runs, five wides, down the leg side, quicker through the air and McCullum can't get behind it, the misery continues
tossed up outside off, inviting Duminy to drive and he obliges, caressing it beautifully past extra cover for a boundary, nothing going New Zealand's way
bowled on a good length on the off, pushed through to mid-off
gets front and across and flicks that through square leg for a single
slower one bowled slightly short on the off, defended towards point
back of a length outside off, stands tall and guides that to point
some extra bounce there for Mills, took off from a good length and moved away from Duminy, who edged it through the slip region, there's no one there and McCullum has no chance
this time he moves well across and turns that through midwicket for two more
flighted on the off, pushed down the ground to long-off for a single
gets the sweep right this time, it lands on leg stump and Duminy laps it through the vacant fine-leg region, four more
went on straight, punched through point who misfields to allow them a single
excellent fielding by Guptill at extra cover, he throws himself to his right to stop a flowing cover-drive
Williamson does well this time at point as it's chopped to his right
angling it on the pads, easy pickings on the leg side, a single through square leg
short of a good length outside off, beat Amla who poked at it, McCullum fumbles behind the stumps to concede a bye
angling it away from Duminy, Aleem Dar surprisingly gives it a wide, it didn't look like one, Mills isn't amused, wants to call for a review for that
pitched on a good length, cracked firmly wide of mid-off but can't beat the field
he beats the field with ease this time, full and wide, in the zone for Duminy who punishes that through mid-off and extra cover, 150 up for South Africa
bowls it short on middle, jab-pulls it down to deep square leg for a single
bowled it short and wide, slapped it through the off-side field for a single
rotating the strike well are these two, another single for Amla
slides it past the off stump, this holds its line and Duminy leaves it alone
low full toss and Duminy drills it straight to Ryder at extra cover who can't quite hold on
bowled it flat on the off stump, gets forward and defends it to cover
slightly short on the off, guided past point for a single
appeared to keep a little low, punched back towards the bowler
slightly short on the off stump, turned past square leg for a single
slightly short on the off, punched towards long-off for a single
long hop and Amla pulls it hard but straight to square leg
bowled on a good length, gets across and plays it to midwicket
presses it down the ground to long-on for a single
Duminy comes down the track and clips it through square leg for a single
Duminy fetches thast from the off stump and sweeps it powerfully to deep square leg
sliding on the pads, Amla tickles it behind deep backward square leg for a couple of runs
No stopping that, New Zealand just haven't found a way to plug the boundaries, tossed up and Amla takes that from a length and creams it through extra cover
almost lands in the blockhole, dug out back to the bowler
flatter and quicker through the air, gets all the way back and works it square for a single

Nethula's had a catch dropped off his bowling but he's not going to spill one, a googly that and Duminy failed to pick it, closed the face on it, expecting it to turn in and got a leading edge as it went the other way, it landed safely into the palms of an expectant Nethula, who'll be mightily relieved
short of a good length outside off, AB leaves it alone
back of a length on middle, drops it down in front of square leg and sets off for a single
fires it full on middle, Amla gets across and knocks it into the leg side for a single
bowled in the channel outside off, holds its line and AB lets it through
low full toss on the off, defended towards extra cover
slightly short on the off, Amla moves back and cracks it to extra cover
tossed up outside off, Amla gets to the pitch and drives it with the turn wide of long-off for a couple of runs
fires it slightly wide and gets it to turn away, Amla leaves it be
ooh, landed just short of Nethula, tossed up and Amla drove it back uppishly, Nethula dived to his left and could only grab it on the half-volley
the boundaries keep coming, short outside off, Amla waits for it to turn and cuts it behind point in the short-third region to collect four runs
nudged into the leg side for a single to keep strike
back of a length outside off, cut down towards third man past the slip fielder for a single
a touch too much width there, easy for de Villiers to run it down to third man
targeting the ribs, Amla works him away through midwicket
squared him up just a little, angling in towards middle and appeared to just get it to move away slightly, AB defended it awkwardly into the off side
bowled it full outside off, dug out back towards the bowler
pitched up and AB eases it elegantly through the covers for a couple of runs
worked away off the back foot through square leg for a single
steered through point into the deep for one more
unlucky again, kept a little low, tried to chop it to point as it spun away, got an inside edge just past the stumps
pushed through for an easy single
looked like the googly, AB negotiated it watchfully, dabbing it into the off side

a bit of turn for Nethula, he has a slip in place and got AB to push at that one, landed on a good length, AB, trying to open the face, got a thick outside edge past slip, and past short third, for three more
short of a good length on middle, defended on the pitch from the crease
short outside off, waits for it to come on and plays it past point into the deep for a single

appeal for a catch, McCullum isn't sure, short and wide and Amla went for the cut, got a thick under-edge and McCullum took it with one hand, diving to his right, McKay thought Aml was out but McCullum wasn't sure himself, replays show the ball may have just hit the ground before McCullum grabbed it, excellent effort nevertheless
superb yorker, bowled at 146kmph, Amla had no clue, was too late in bringing the bat down, somehow managed to get some part of his bat to keep it away from the stumps, he was totally done in there
short of a good length on the off, knocked down into the leg side off the back foot
angling in towards middle and leg, pushed wide of mid-on for a quick single
flighted on the off, driven down the ground towards long-off for a single
shortish outside off, chopped it towards point from the crease
turned away sharply and kept a little low as Amla attempted a cut, missed

Nethula has his man, finally, excellent piece of bowling this time, bowled it much closer to the off stump this time and got the desired amount of turn, a fair amount of rip in that ball, Amla got forward and could not prevent himself from trying to open the face, got a thin edge and McCullum made no mistake, more relief for Nethula
tossed up on the off, drives it down to mid-off
turning away, Ontong fishes for that one, misses, some nerves for the new man
fullish and driven through the cover region for a couple of runs
short of a good length on middle, gets back and defends it into the leg side
wonderful timing, was pitched up on middle and AB's firm push down the pitch yields a boundary, minimum effort involved, all timing
Ontong rushes for a quick single after it's dabbed wide of Guptill at extra cover, Guptill attempts a flick at the striker's end while diving to his left but the throw is wayward
Bouncer from McKay and Ontong isn't sure how to deal with it, half-heartedly attempts a pull and misses
angling in towards middle, played off the back foot to midwicket
plenty of power behind that, but McKay does superbly, having just completed an over, to dive full length to save a couple of runs at deep cover
tossed up on leg stump, turned past square leg for a single
flighted on middle, drives it straight back to Nethula on the bounce
withdraws his bat at the last moment just as it turns away
beaten, lovely delivery landing on off and spinning away to beat the outside edge as he rocked forward, McCullum fumbled and conceded a bye
tossed up on middle, AB tickles him past midwicket to get a single and retain strike
angling in from round the wicket towards off, defended solidly into the off side
back of a length on middle, was an attempted slower short ball, defended on the pitch
slower one bowled slightly short on the off, punched straight to extra cover
cracked hard off the meat off the back foot towards extra cover where Guptill fields
angling in towards middle, plays it down through square leg for a single
low full toss on leg stump, a juicy delivery at 133kph, flicked towards deep square leg for a single
some reverse there for Southee but Ontong handled that with style, stepped forward, got to the pitch of a good length ball and drove it handsomely down the ground past the bowler
shortish, guided past point, in front of third man, for a couple more runs
shortish outside off, chopped towards point from the crease
goodish length on the off, Ontong moves back and defends it to cover
dropped it short outside off, Ontong didn't time that too well, was aiming for some elevation on that one but mistimed it to midwicket
short of a good length on the off, taps it in front of point
angling in towards middle from slightly wide of the crease, worked away off the back foot through square leg
drops it down into the leg side and steals a quick single
slower one bowled short outside off, taps it behind point for one more
the offcutter, lands on a good length and cuts back in, Ontong is solid on the back foot
a fraction short on middle and leg and Ontong is drawn into playing the pull, goes hard at that one but can't connect, struck on the thighs
pushed away through midwicket into the deep for a single
Ontong goes for the pull again and it comes off, but not in the desired fashion, short outside off and he gets a top edge over McCullum
comes off perfectly this time, short outside off and he middles it like he wants to, short and it's pulled powerfully over midwicket
back of a length outside off, cut away down towards third man for a single
AB made room and Southee chased him, pushed it full, was driven to mid-on
tries something similar, AB moves away again and Southee generously doles this out on the pads, flicked away to the fine-leg boundary is the result
short of a good length outside off, turned past square leg for a single, scores level
AB does it delicately, it's a gentle nudge through square leg and South Africa have won comprehensively, taking the series with them
